medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Duration of depression estimated at about 1 year. Symptoms included instability, ruminations about family problems, guilt about yelling at her children, beliefs of being a bad person, and suicidal ideation. She had attempted suicide six months prior to admission. Symptoms progressed to vegetative signs including terminal insomnia, decreased appetite, 4.5 kg weight loss, constipation, and decreased libido.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 14-year duration of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) symptoms; documented diagnosis by LE cell preparations 11 years prior to admission. Previous psychiatric admission 9 years prior due to steroid-induced delirium.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with chronic depressive symptoms; sister with mild mental retardation.
